Q.question: What is the size of char variable?
What is the default value of int variable?
What is the default value of Object variable?
What is inheritance?
Q.choice1: It is the process where one object acquires the properties of another.
Q.choice2: inheritance is the ability of an object to take on many forms.
Q.choice3: inheritance is a technique to define different methods of same type.
Q.answer: It is the process where one object acquires the properties of another.

Q.question: What is true about a final class?
Q.choice1: class declard final is a final class.
Q.choice2: Final classes are created so the methods implemented by that class cannot be overridden.

Q.question: What happens when thread's yield() method is called?
Q.choice1: Thread returns to the ready state.
Q.choice2: Thread returns to the waiting state.
Q.answer: Thread returns to the ready state.

Q.question: What will happen if static modifier is removed from the signature of the main method?
Q.choice3: Program will compile and run without any output.
Q.choice4: Program will compile and run to show the required output.

Q.question: What is currentThread()?
Q.choice1: It is a Thread public static method used to obtain a reference to the current thread.
Q.choice2: It is a thread's instance method used to get thread count.
Q.choice3: It is a object's public static method used obtain a reference to the current thread.
Q.choice4: It is a object's instance method used to get thread count.
Q.answer: It is a Thread public static method used to obtain a reference to the current thread.

Q.question: What of the following is the default value of an instance variable?
Q.choice3: Depends upon the type of variable
Q.answer: Depends upon the type of variable

Q.question: What is the size of boolean variable?
Which of the following is true about protected access modifier?
Q.choice1: Variables, methods and constructors which are declared protected can be accessed by any class.
Q.choice2: Variables, methods and constructors which are declared protected can be accessed by any class lying in same package.
Q.choice3: Variables, methods and constructors which are declared protected in the superclass can be accessed only by its child class.
Q.answer: Variables, methods and constructors which are declared protected in the superclass can be accessed only by its child class.

Q.question: What is an applet?
Q.choice1: An applet is a Java program that runs in a Web browser.
Q.choice2: Applet is a standalone java program.
Q.choice4: Applet is a run time environment.
Q.answer: An applet is a Java program that runs in a Web browser.

Q.question: What is the size of double variable?
What is the default value of float variable?
What is instance variable?
Q.choice1: Instance variables are static variables within a class but outside any method.
Q.choice2: Instance variables are variables defined inside methods, constructors or blocks.
Q.choice3: Instance variables are variables within a class but outside any method.
Q.answer: Instance variables are variables within a class but outside any method.

Q.question: What is composition?
Q.choice2: Composition is a way to create an object.
Q.choice3: Holding the reference of the other class within some other class is known as composition.
Q.answer: Holding the reference of the other class within some other class is known as composition.

Q.question: What invokes a thread's run() method?
Q.choice1: JVM invokes the thread's run() method when the thread is initially executed.
Q.choice3: start() method of the thread class.
Q.answer: JVM invokes the thread's run() method when the thread is initially executed.

Q.question: Which method must be implemented by all threads?
Which of the following is not a keyword in java?
What is the size of long variable?
What is the default value of String variable?
Which of the following is false about String?
Q.choice2: String can be created using new operator.
Q.choice3: String is a primary data type.
Q.answer: String is a primary data type.
